Detailed Description

Find least-norm solution (using Moore-Penrose pseudo-inverse solution method
  • provides a single solution vector)

base::Matrix LeastNorm::solve (  const Matrix &    A,
const Vector &    b
)  [virtual]
 

For Ax=b, solves for the solution(s) x. Returns a Matrix whos rows represent the set of vectors that span a sub-space of the solution space. This could be the entire solution space, or just a single solution (hence column).

Implements robot::control::ikor::UnderdeterminedSystemSolver.

bool base::Referenced::unreference (    )  const [inline, inherited]
 

decrement the reference count by one, indicating that a pointer to this object is referencing it. If the refence count goes to zero, it is assumed that this object is nolonger referenced and is automatically deleted.
